item.title: Markdown
item.author: 1109647326@qq.com (hhjian)
item.description: 高亮，代码可识别的语言：1c, abnf, accesslog, actionscript, ada, apache, applescript, arduino, armasm, asciidoc, aspectj, autohotkey, autoit, avrasm, awk, axapta, bash, basic, bnf, brainfuck, cal, capnproto, ceylon, clean, clojure, clojure-repl, cmake, coffeescript, coq, cos, cpp, crmsh, crystal, cs, csp, css, d, dart, delphi, diff, django, dns, dockerfile, dos, dsconfig, dts, dust, ebnf, elixir, elm, erb, erlang, erlang-repl, excel, fix, flix,

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.author: 1109647326@qq.com (hhjian)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
